short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Little helper to improve the daily use of the TUM online services :)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The TUM helper will improve the user-friendliness of some TUM online tools that we as students have to use every day. An example would be the highlighting of homework that still needs to be done in AutomataTutor
